front.title: A New BGP Well-Known Community, LAST_RESORT

abstract.t: This Internet Draft describes a new well-known BGP community, LAST_RESORT. This community provides a simple and easily deployable solution to BGP "wedgies". Initial deployment is expected to be achieved by voluntary use in the network operator community-at-large. Long-term adoption via software enforcement of the well-known aspect of the community, will improve global behavior, and simplify router configurations.Author's Note This Internet Draft is intended to result in this draft or a related draft(s) being placed on the Standards Track for idr.
